title: [Question]pesu i/o courses
content: any of the 2nd yrs.. going for these courses?? which course? and are they helpful ?? last time i didnt apply to any so i was wondering if i shud now.

comments.body: Dont join, waste of money honestly, They are not useful tbh. you can learn those outside for free

If you're interested in a course, I'd suggest take it

How much you learn in the course you pick honestly depends entirely on how the SME was and how much interest you have in the field

Me personally, I've taken 2 I/O courses in the past and i was lucky enough to have amazing SMEs both times, and i still keep in touch with them to this day

Ultimately, if you like the topic of the course, I'd suggest take it, and if after a few days you dont feel like its a worthy way of spending your time, you can always drop it, its not like its gonna effect your gpa or show up anywhere else on your scorecard

i took pesu io course, and i can say that if you wanna explore a new field, then go for it cause lets be honest, how many online courses do we usually finish, but if you're looking for an in-depth course or anything as such, then i wouldnt recommend it
So true, can vouch for this
